Detailed Description

Processor for reading the AHCAL Labview asscii files.

It processes the input data to create events with LCIO collections of the AHCAL Labview ascii output. Based on F. Gaede's StdHepReader to be found in the marlin package.

Author:
: S. Lu (DESY Hamburg)
Date:
Aug 15 2012
